dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf
Of Policy Enforcement
Posted At: Friday, May 12, 2006 12:12 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: [ABUSE] Notice of Infringement
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Notice of Infringement


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

copyright@theplanet.com is the clearinghouse for all copyright
infringement rports. Your email is being sent to our legal counsel at
the address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration. You may find
their direct contact information at this URL:
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Fashion Glow wrote:
> 
> RE: ResellerRatings.com
>  
> It has come to our attention that ResellerRatings.com, a site hosted 
> by The Planet, is using service and/or trademark(s) proprietary to 
> FASHIONGLOW. FASHIONGLOW has further notified ResellerRatings that it 
> is not authorized to use its name, hyperlinking to its website or 
> libels about FASHIONGLOW and its affiliates ( ie: SHOPCHIC) nor  to 
> display its marks at:
>  
> http://www.resellerratings.com/seller12707.html
>  
> We believe THE PLANET respects the rights of both its users and the 
> owners and rights holders of intellectual property.  Accordingly, and 
> in accordance with the PLANET Terms of Service, we request that THE 
> PLANET expeditiously remove or disable access to the mark(s) in
question.
> PLEASE BE ADVISED THAT UNLESS THE CONTENT IN QUESTION IS REMOVED, OR 
> ACCESS TO THE CONTENT IS DISABLED, WITHIN FORTY-EIGHT (48) HOURS, 
> FASHIONGLOW INTENDS TO IMMEDIATELY CONSIDER LEGAL ACTION.
>  
>  
>  ResellerRatings.com has responded to our request to remove the 
> contents in question by a REBUTTAL . Consequently, we request that The

> Planet contributes to enforce FASHIONGLOW's rights according to the 
> Intellectual Property Infringement Policy or any copyright law.
> We wish to thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation and 
> assistance in this matter.
>  
>  
> Eleni Simmons
> Copyright Agent
> E-mail: copyright@FashionGlow.com <mailto:copyright@FashionGlow.com>
>  
>  
> FASHIONGLOW/ SHOPCHIC
> 8721 Santa Monica Blvd. Ste 1058
> Los Angeles CA 90069
> (323) 297-2576
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFEZMHwvK/XpJs6oyURAte3AKCfVm7h8DhSOT8Jfepn8y/q8094hACfSzUV
